alert.note: Alert for Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 11:21PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Woods and northeastern Woodward Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1121 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Alabaster Caverns State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waynoka, Freedom, Alabaster Caverns State Park, Avard, Hopeton and Camp Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
